attributes.action: Only allow computerisation of those elements of medical records people sign up for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If medical records from GPs are computerised, then surely as with any disclosure of information about patients' records this should be agreed by the patient and not be automatic. Some medical records may well be subjective ie opinion rather than fact and where patients are unhappy about parts of their medical histories being disclosed, they should have the right to have these elements withheld. After all, if the purpose is to enhance medical treatment for people, then surely it up to those people to decide which parts of their medical make up they want medical access to. [This petition assumes that computerisation is going ahead]
